Name: Sword of Light
Details: The elite of the DCMS BattleMech forces, members of the Sword of Light must first have a minimum of five flawless years of service in another unit and then must pass an arduous battery of mental, political, spiritual and physical tests.  The Sword of Light consists of five active combat reinforced regiments that travel the Combine to assist where most needed.  As an elite unit, they receive priority preference for all supplies and have their own dedicated JumpShips - something quite unusual in this day and age.
